title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Colts QB Matt Ryan. Does he know how many roughing the passer calls have been called against him, and where does that rank over the last 5 years? NBA on TNT analyst Charles Barkley shares the details of his new contract and helps preview the NBA season. And Chargers QB Justin Herbert calls in to discuss their win against the Broncos last night. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Colts QB Matt Ryan. Does he know how many roughing the passer calls have been called against him, and where does that rank over the last 5 years? NBA on TNT analyst Charles Barkley shares the details of his new contract and helps preview the NBA season.
